Name: Iron Man
Description: Armed with superior intellect and a nanotech battlesuit of his own design, Tony Stark stands alongside gods as the Invincible Iron Man. His state of the art armor turns any battlefield into his personal playground, allowing him to steal the spotlight he so desperately desires.

Name: Captain America
Description: Enhanced to the peak of human physicality by an experimental serum, Steve Rogers embodies the spirit of freedom as Captain America. Wielding his iconic vibranium shield, he leads the charge against tyranny and injustice with unwavering resolve.

Name: Thor
Description: As the God of Thunder, Thor wields the enchanted hammer Mjolnir, channeling the raw power of storms to vanquish his foes. With a mighty roar and a flash of lightning, he descends upon the battlefield, bringing divine wrath to those who threaten the realms.

Name: Hela
Description: As the Goddess of Death, Hela wields supreme control over the fallen souls residing in Hel. With a haunting whisper and a murder of crows, the queen of the underworld gracefully reaps the souls of her enemies without an ounce of mercy.
